meanings.definition: Relating to the internal content or meaning of a concept or term.
meanings.sent1: The intensional aspects of the story reveal hidden depths.
meanings.sent2: She had an intensional understanding of the complex theory.
meanings.sent3: The intensional twist in the plot made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His intensional gaze seemed to penetrate through walls.
meanings.sent5: The intensional nature of the painting left a lasting impression.

meanings.definition: Involving the mental representation of an object or idea.
meanings.sent1: Her intensional visualization skills helped her solve the puzzle.
meanings.sent2: The intensional image in his mind was crystal clear.
meanings.sent3: The intensional mix-up of thoughts made him chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The intensional map of memories guided her through the past.
meanings.sent5: His intensional dreams felt more real than waking life.

meanings.definition: Expressing a specific quality or attribute.
meanings.sent1: The intensional tone of his voice conveyed authority.
meanings.sent2: Her intensional choice of words was impactful.
meanings.sent3: The intensional color of the room brightened everyone's mood.
meanings.sent4: The intensional scent of flowers filled the air with nostalgia.
meanings.sent5: His intensional gesture showed kindness and empathy.
